name: PianoVision
summary:
IMPORTANT: 
PianoVision is available with a one-time purchase for PianoVision Basic—which gives you access to over 1,000 public domain songs and the ability to import. An optional PianoVision Plus subscription unlocks an expansive library of 10,000+ popular songs and advanced mixed reality features. 
Some users from V1 prefer it over V2. If this is you, email zac@pianovision.app. If you try V2 and want to also try V1, we're happy to let you as well. We want everyone to have the best PV...
